title: Bug 10403: Confirming if the bin directory can be scrubbed during project creation
OB: When a user creates a new project, we should confirm that the output directory (bin) can be deleted and rebuilt. Some users are creating projects and pointing the output folder to a bin directory which contains more than just .class files that can be rebuilt from the available .java files.
EB: Currently, there is no confirmation or validation process in place to ensure that the bin directory can be scrubbed during project creation.
